segments.text: Where did you want to go for lunch ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I was thinking we should just go to the cafeteria .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't think I ever got food from the cafeteria .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I actually like the food there .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Does the cafeteria sell a lot of different food ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I was thinking about getting some Chinese food .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I bought some chow mein at the cafeteria . It tasted great .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We can eat at the cafeteria .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think you'll really like the food there .
segments.speaker: S2
